name: eslint-plugin-tmaiadev-jest-rules
description: This ESLint Plugin will enforce your Jest tests to follow the 'Given When Then' and the 'it should' patterns.

scripts.test: node rules/enforce-gwt.test.js && node rules/enforce-gwt-capitalized.test.js && node rules/enforce-it-should.test.js

author: Thalles Maia
